task.title: Insert New Paper
task.shortdesc: You can insert a new piece of typing paper into your typewriter by manually feeding your paper into your platen roller.

step.cmd: Manually feed a new sheet of paper downward behind the platen.
Push the paper release lever back so that it is deactivated.
Roll and adjust the new sheet of paper.

substep.cmd: Roll the platen knob forwards, towards the back of the typewriter until the paper begins to come out from under the platen roller.
Curve the paper backwards so that it is behind the paper bail.
Move the paper bail back to a closed position so that it is resting against the paper.

step.note: If the new sheet of paper seems unstable, misaligned, or becomes crinkled, it may not be loaded correctly.

substep.cmd: Use the return lever to move the carriage to the left margin and begin typing.
